title: Executive Order 6202-Phosphate Restoration No. 54, Wyoming
content: So much of Executive order of July 2, 1910, creating Phosphate Reserve No. 4, Wyoming No. 1, as affects the land hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 38 N., R. 114 W., sec. 4, Mineral Survey No. 553 (Granite Placer claim).(Unsurveyed)
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6202-Phosphate Restoration No. 54, Wyoming Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362020
